item.description:
Named for its mile-long face of veined granite quartz, Diamond Hill is another great place to hike. Climb to the summit and you can see for miles around on a clear day. Once youâ€™ve gotten to the top of the former ski slopes (the smaller hill on the left is a much easier hike you come to walking trails from which you can see the Diamond Hill Reservoir to the east and Woonsocket and beyond to the west.

Please be sure to bring water and a snack. Sturdy sneakers or hiking shoes suggested.

If you'd prefer to skip the game (your loss ), your more then welcome to just do the hike.

Dogs are welcome at the park, however signs say leashed. But Mr. Wiggles was off leash the entire time I last went.
item.name: Hike before the Game
